title: Huge fps drop Spectate Mode
body: Hey guys, So since 2 days, i think, everytime i spectate someone ive got huge fps drops. When i start a Game everything is fine( 60fps all the time) but when i spectate my fps drops to 20, 34 and so on. Does someone have the same problem?

replies.body: It seems that there could be game files that are not loading properly during spectate mode, which can affect a smooth experience.  There may be some other factors like drivers, but there are a few steps we can take to rule some factors out.  I recommend going over our[ FPS issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)guide which will provide some instructions towards getting this fixed up.  Let me know if the results don't work, or if you have any questions.
